name: Arrows (Prilia)
description:
You don't always have to keep up with the music, right? sometimes the intention is to mislead you...

Keep in mind that nothing is impossible, it just doesn't have to be that easy, with determination and the desire to have a good time (alone or in company) you could be surprised ...

As the title of the game indicates, you will have to use the dates on your keyboard to play, to select an option you can use the return key (enter) or the space bar, you can pause the game with the escape key or with the P key , you can also restart the level with the R key, but it is faster to do it from the pause menu. The mouse will hardly be used, I hope you like it.

I wish you the best of luck and have a great time!
